abilities.P: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage and heals him, based on the target's max health.
abilities.Q: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.
abilities.W: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.
abilities.E: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.
abilities.R: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and move speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.

abilities.P: After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals. After talking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.
abilities.Q: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
abilities.W: Ahri gains a brief burst of move speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
abilities.E: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
abilities.R: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
